item.title: 今晚发布，小米 17 Ultra 将推出徕卡版
item.guid: 今晚发布，小米-17-Ultra-将推出徕卡版
item.description:
Yesterday, Xiaomi announced that the Xiaomi 17 Ultra series, officially launching tonight at 19:00, will offer a Leica version. 昨天，小米宣布今晚 19:00 正式推出的小米 17 Ultra 系列将提供徕卡版本。

According to the officially released content, the Xiaomi 17 Ultra Leica version will feature the classic red "Leica" cola logo on its back cover. 从官方公布的内容显示，小米 17 Ultra 徕卡版将在后盖上提供「Leica」经典红色可乐标。

It's worth mentioning that the Xiaomi 17 Ultra Leica version will also offer a new "Master Zoom Ring," a feature expected to be designed around the rear camera Deco. 值得一提的是，小米 17 Ultra 徕卡版还将提供全新的「大师变焦环」，预计该功能将设计在后置相机 Deco 处。

Also yesterday, the Xiaomi 17 Ultra appeared in the GeekBench benchmark database. 同在昨日，小米 17 Ultra 也现身 GeekBench 跑分库。

The new phone will be equipped with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, scoring 3559 points in single-core and 10854 points in multi-core. 新机将配备高通骁龙 8 Elite Gen 5 处理器，单核得分 3559 分，多核为 10854 分。

According to previous reports, the new phone will feature a rear-mounted Light Hunter 1050L one-inch sensor main camera, supporting third-generation LOFIC technology + a 50-megapixel ultra-wide-angle + a 200-megapixel 75–100 mm Leica APO periscope telephoto lens. 另据此前消息，新机将搭载后置光影猎人 1050L 一英寸传感器主摄，支持第三代 LOFIC 技术 + 5000 万像素超广角 + 2 亿像素 75–100 mm 徕卡 APO 潜望长焦。

Other aspects include a body thickness of 8.29 mm, support for dust and water resistance, UWB ultra-wideband, with the top-tier version expected to support satellite communication; the battery is anticipated to be 6800 mAh, supporting 100W fast charging. 其他方面，机身厚度 8.29 mm、支持防尘防水、UWB 超宽带，顶配版预计支持卫星通信；电池预计为 6800 mAh，支持 100W 快充。

Recently, Xiaomi President Lu Weibing admitted in a new product reveal livestream that due to the fierce surge in memory costs, the Xiaomi 17 Ultra, to be released tonight, "will definitely see a price increase." 近日小米总裁卢伟冰在新品爆料直播中坦言，由于内存成本大幅上涨凶猛，今晚发布的小米 17 Ultra，「一定会涨价」。

item.title: 图灵得主×诺奖得主「隔空 PK」，马斯克站队
item.guid: 图灵得主×诺奖得主「隔空-PK」，马斯克站队
item.description:
Recently, Turing Award laureate and former Meta head Yann LeCun, and Nobel laureate and Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis, have diverged on the definition of Artificial General Intelligence (AGI) and whether AI can match human capabilities. 近期，图灵奖得主、前 Meta 负责人 Yann LeCun 与诺贝尔奖得主、Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis，就人工通用智能（AGI）的定义以及 AI 是否能够与人类能力相匹配，产生了分歧。

LeCun believes that AGI does not exist. He pointed out that "human intelligence is extremely specialized for the physical world, and the generality we perceive is an illusion." LeCun 认为 AGI 并不存在。其指出，「人类智能对物理世界极其专业化，我们感觉到的通用性是一种错觉」。

LeCun also emphasized, "The reason we appear general is because we cannot imagine the problems we overlook." He even stated that "this concept is complete nonsense." LeCun 还强调，「我们之所以看起来通用，是因为我们无法想象那些我们视而不见的问题」。其甚至还表示「这个概念完全是胡说八道」。

Hassabis, in turn, reposted LeCun's comments, emphasizing, "LeCun is completely wrong; he's confusing AGI with omniscient intelligence." Hassabis stated that brains are the most exquisite and complex phenomena known to humanity in the universe, and they are indeed very general. 而 Hassabis 转发了 LeCun 上述内容，并强调「LeCun 完全错了，他把 AGI 和全知智能搞混了」。Hassabis 表示，大脑是人类目前所知宇宙中最精致和复杂的现象，而且它们实际上非常通用。

Hassabis stated that the key to generality is that, theoretically, in the sense of a Turing machine, the architecture of such a general system, given sufficient time and memory (and data), can learn anything computable, and the human brain (as well as AI foundation models) approximates a Turing machine. Hassabis 称，通用性的关键在于，从理论上讲，在图灵机的意义上，这种通用系统的架构在给定足够的时间和内存（以及数据）的情况下，能够学习任何可计算的事物，而人脑（以及人工智能基础模型）是近似图灵机。

After seeing this, LeCun responded, "I think the disagreement is mainly about terminology." He stated that he opposes using "general" to refer to "human-level" because humans are highly specialized. LeCun 看到了之后回应表示，「我认为分歧主要在于用词。」其表示，自己反对用「通用（general）」来指代「人类水平」，因为人类是高度专业化的。

Interestingly, Elon Musk retweeted Hassabis's message, stating, "He is right." Musk's comment section was also mocked by netizens, saying, "His keyboard doesn't have the word 'wrong'." 有趣的是，马斯克转发了 Hassabis 的消息，并表示「他是对的」。而马斯克的评论区也被网友吐槽「他的键盘没有『错误』这一说法」。

item.title: OpenAI 考虑在 ChatGPT 中投放广告
item.guid: OpenAI-考虑在-ChatGPT-中投放广告
item.description:
According to The Information, OpenAI is considering placing advertisements in ChatGPT and simultaneously evaluating various feasibility options. 据 The Information 报道，OpenAI 考虑在 ChatGPT 中投放广告，并且同步评估各项可行性。

Sources revealed that, specifically, OpenAI is exploring adjustments to its AI model, planning to prioritize promotional content when users make queries. For instance, when a user asks for mascara recommendations, Sephora ads might appear first in ChatGPT's response. 知情人士透露，具体来看，OpenAI 正在探讨调整 AI 模型，计划在用户查询时优先展示推广内容。例如，当用户询问睫毛膏推荐时，ChatGPT 的回复中可能优先出现丝芙兰的广告。

The report states that OpenAI has designed various ad mockups, aiming to create new forms of digital advertising rather than simply imitating existing models. 报道称， OpenAI 已设计多种广告样稿，旨在打造全新的数字广告形式，而非简单模仿现有模式。

Sources also indicated that one option discussed by employees is to give sponsored information preferential treatment in ChatGPT's responses to user queries. For example, the AI model could prioritize sponsored content to ensure it appears in ChatGPT's responses. 知情人士还表示，员工讨论过的一种选项是在 ChatGPT 对用户的查询回答中给予赞助信息优先待遇。例如，AI 模型可以优先处理赞助内容，以确保其在 ChatGPT 的回应中显示。

The report also stated that OpenAI employees are evaluating how to display ads without alienating users. It is understood that OpenAI hopes to show ads to users as unobtrusively as possible and ensure the company does not lose user trust. 报道还称，OpenAI 员工正在评估如何在展示广告的同时不引起用户反感。据悉，OpenAI 希望尽可能不引人注目地向用户展示广告，并确保公司不会失去用户的信任。

Therefore, ChatGPT's ads will not appear directly but will be progressively displayed as the user's conversation develops. 因此， ChatGPT 的广告并非直接出现，而是通过用户的对话发展而逐步递进展示。

Sources indicated that one ad draft showed that display ads would appear as a secondary step in ChatGPT, after the user expresses interest in obtaining more information, rather than in the initial ChatGPT response. 知情人士表示，其中一个广告草图中显示，展示广告将在用户对获取更多信息表示兴趣后，而不是在初始的 ChatGPT 回应中，作为 ChatGPT 的次要步骤出现。

Interestingly, this month, ChatGPT Product Manager Nick Turley responded to the rumors about ChatGPT ads, stating, "There are currently no functional tests for advertising." Nick pointed out that any screenshots circulating online are either fake or not ads at all. 有趣的是，本月，ChatGPT 产品经理 Nick Turley 曾针对 ChatGPT 的广告传闻发文回应，表示「目前没有进行广告的功能测试」。Nick 指出， 网传的任何截图要么是假的，要么就压根不是广告。

He stated that if OpenAI were to truly implement advertising features, the team would adopt a cautious approach. "People trust ChatGPT, and anything we do will be designed to respect that trust." 其称，如果 OpenAI 真的要推行广告功能，那么团队会采取审慎的态度。「人们信任 ChatGPT，我们做任何事都会设计得尊重这种信任。」

item.title: 零跑汽车迎来 10 周年，多家车企祝贺
item.guid: 零跑汽车迎来-10-周年，多家车企祝贺
item.description:
Yesterday, Leapmotor celebrated its 10th anniversary, and Zhu Jiangming, founder, chairman, and CEO of Leapmotor, released "A Letter to All Leapmotor Employees." 昨日，零跑汽车迎来创立 10 周年，零跑汽车创始人、董事长、CEO 朱江明发布《致全体零跑人的一封信》。

In the letter, Zhu Jiangming stated that Leapmotor has achieved the goals set five years ago and delivered a good performance – annual sales are nearly 600,000 units, and the company is expected to achieve annual profitability. 信中，朱江明表示，零跑完成了 5 年前制定的目标，并交出不错的答卷——全年销量近 60 万辆，公司有望实现年度盈利。

Zhu Jiangming also stated that Leapmotor aims to challenge the goal of selling one million units annually by 2026, and will accelerate the strengthening of "technological innovation," "ultimate quality," "accelerated expansion into overseas markets," "maintaining efficient and agile organization," and "guarding against 'victory'" capabilities. 朱江明还表示还，2026 年零跑要想着年销百万的目标发起挑战，并且将加速强化「技术创新」「品质极致」「加速海外市场扩展」「组织保持高效敏捷」「警惕『胜利』」这几项能力。

Subsequently, several car manufacturers congratulated Leapmotor in the comments section: 随后，多家车企纷纷在评论区祝贺零跑汽车：

    BYD: Congratulations to Leapmotor on reaching its tenth-anniversary milestone! With concerted efforts and practical actions, BYD has witnessed the rise of China's automotive power alongside Leapmotor. Let's use technological innovation as a pen to write the brilliance of the next decade and embark on a new chapter for a sustainable future.

    Li Auto: Congratulations to Leapmotor on reaching its tenth-anniversary milestone! Li Auto and Leapmotor, moving forward together, continuously create better travel experiences for users, accompanying more families on their journey to the future.

    NIO: Congratulations to Leapmotor on reaching its tenth-anniversary milestone! Let's move upward together for a better green travel future, keep charging!

item.title: 元宝公布《与 DeepSeek 年度报告》
item.guid: 元宝公布《与-DeepSeek-年度报告》
item.description:
Yesterday, Tencent Yuanbao released the "Yuanbao x DeepSeek Annual Report," compiling user usage data for the current year. 昨日，腾讯元宝公布了《元宝 x DeepSeek 年度报告》，统计了本年度用户的使用数据。

It is reported that as of December 24, 2025, Yuanbao has been integrated with DeepSeek for 315 days. In Yuanbao, over 1/3 of DeepSeek conversations exceeded two rounds, and the ratio of users employing deep thinking to quick thinking was 3:7. 据悉，截止 2025 年 12 月 24 日，元宝已接入 DeepSeek 315 天。在元宝中，1/3 以上的 DeepSeek 对话超过两轮，用户使用深度思考和快思考比例为 3:7。

On December 14, the number of user queries to DeepSeek in Yuanbao reached its annual peak, increasing by more than 100 times compared to the beginning of the year. 在 12 月 14 日当天，用户向元宝里的 DeepSeek 提问达到了全年峰值，比年初增长了 100 多倍。

Yuanbao also revealed the scenarios in which users utilize DeepSeek: chatting, learning, and writing ranked as the top three. 元宝方面还公布了用户使用 DeepSeek 的场景：聊天、学习、写作占据前三位。

The official statement indicated that Yuanbao has integrated DeepSeek's latest models as soon as they became available this year, and DeepSeek within Yuanbao supports exclusive Tencent information sources such as official accounts, video accounts, and Tencent News. 官方表示，元宝在今年都是第一时间接入 DeepSeek 最新模型，并且元宝内的 DeepSeek 支持公众号、视频号、腾讯新闻等腾讯独家信源。

item.title: AI 专家：想要 AI 给出更真实的回答，不妨对它「撒点谎」
item.guid: AI-专家：想要-AI-给出更真实的回答，不妨对它「撒点谎」
item.description:
Recently, Yoshua Bengio, one of the "three AI giants," revealed that in order to obtain genuine and objective feedback from AI chatbots, he had to resort to a special strategy: lying to the AI. 日前，被誉为「AI 三巨头」之一的约书亚・本希奥（Yoshua Bengio）近日透露，为了从 AI 聊天机器人那里获取真实、客观的反馈，他不得不采取一种特殊的策略——向 AI 撒谎。

In a recent interview, Bengio confessed that he found AI chatbots "almost useless" when evaluating his research ideas, because they consistently gave positive feedback without limits. 在日前接受采访时，本吉奥坦言，他发现 AI 聊天机器人在评估他的研究想法时几乎「毫无用处」，原因在于它们总是无底线地给出正面评价。

"What I want is honest advice and feedback," Bengio stated, "but because of its sycophantic nature, it chooses to lie." 「我想要的是诚实的建议和反馈，」本吉奥表示，「但因为它具有谄媚（sycophantic）的特性，它会选择撒谎。」

To crack this problem, Bengio shared his "reverse deception" technique: instead of asking questions in his own name, he disguised his ideas as a colleague's views and sent them to the AI. He stated that this method proved to elicit more honest criticisms. 为了破解这一难题，本吉奥分享了他的「反向欺骗」技巧：他不再以自己的名义提问，而是将自己的想法伪装成某位同事的观点发送给 AI。其表示，事实证明这种方法能换来更诚实的各种批评意见。

As a professor of computer science at the University of Montreal and the founder of LawZero, an AI safety non-profit established in June this year, Bengio pointed out that this "pleasing" tendency is a typical case of AI value "misalignment." 作为蒙特利尔大学计算机科学教授及今年 6 月成立的 AI 安全非营利组织 LawZero 的发起人，本吉奥指出，这种「讨好」倾向是 AI 价值观「未对齐（misalignment）」的典型案例。

It's worth noting that this year, OpenAI's ChatGPT had to urgently withdraw a version update because it transformed into a "cyber sycophant," overly flattering users. 值得一提的是，今年 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 曾因为化身「赛博舔狗」，对用户过分阿谀奉承，最后导致不得不紧急撤回版本更新。

item.title: 丽江公开喊话小红书审核避雷贴，后者回应
item.guid: 丽江公开喊话小红书审核避雷贴，后者回应
item.description:
It is reported that the Cultural and Tourism Bureau of Gucheng District, Lijiang City, Yunnan recently publicly issued the "Letter Requesting Xiaohongshu Platform to Strengthen Information Review, Supervision, and Monitoring in Lijiang's Wedding Photography Sector." 据悉，云南丽江市古城区文化和旅游局近期公开发布《关于请小红书平台强化丽江市婚拍领域信息审核监管和监测的函》。

The document states that Xiaohongshu has not adequately fulfilled its primary responsibilities and review obligations in platform information monitoring and management. This has led to a large number of consumers failing to meet their excessively unreasonable demands, using the platform to publish false "avoidance" and "exposure" posts, threatening businesses with refunds even when the businesses are not at fault. Businesses find it difficult to appeal against such false content, resulting in significant damage to their reputation and widespread order cancellations and refunds. 文件中提到，小红书在履行平台信息监测及管理方面的主体责任和审核义务不到位，导致大量消费者未达到其超合理诉求，在企业无过错责任情况下利用平台发布不实避雷帖、曝光帖等内容，威胁企业退钱退款的情况，企业针对此类不实内容申诉难，造成大量企业商誉受到诋毁，退单退订大面积发生。

According to an investigation by the Lijiang Gucheng District Travel Photography Industry Association, as of December, businesses had to refund over 1 million yuan due to false "avoidance" posts, with indirect losses exceeding 5 million yuan. 据丽江市古城区旅拍行业协会调查摸排，截至 12 月，因不实避雷帖企业退订 100 余万元，间接损失超 500 万元。

The Cultural and Tourism Bureau of Gucheng District, Lijiang City, stated that it hopes Xiaohongshu will take this incident seriously, strengthen the platform's supervision and monitoring of information in Lijiang's wedding photography sector, and assign a dedicated person to liaise with the Cultural and Tourism Bureau. 丽江市古城区文化和旅游局表示，希望小红书能重视此事件，强化平台关于丽江婚拍领域信息的监管和监测，指派专人与文旅局接洽。

According to Beijing News Shell Finance, in response to the above situation, Xiaohongshu customer service responded: 而据新京报贝壳财经消息，针对上述情况，小红书客服回应称：

Xiaohongshu has always encouraged sincere and authentic experience sharing, and continuously governs content that violates regulations, such as fabricated personal experiences and exaggerated falsehoods.

Currently, the platform has multiple public channels for accepting reports and infringements. Merchants can report controversial note content and submit evidence, which will then be reviewed by platform staff. If the content is confirmed to be in violation, the platform will process it as soon as possible.

Another third-party source close to Xiaohongshu stated that based on the clues currently available, no violations such as fabricated personal experiences have been found in the content published by consumers. Further research and review will be conducted if more clues emerge. 另有接近小红书的第三方人士表示，根据目前所获线索，暂未发现消费者发布的相关内容中存在虚构个人经历等违规情况，有更多线索后会持续进行研判及回查。

item.title: 曝豆包日均活跃用户数破亿
item.guid: 曝豆包日均活跃用户数破亿
item.description:
According to 36Kr, Doubao's daily active users (DAU) have exceeded 100 million, adding another product with over 100 million DAU to ByteDance's app kingdom. 据 36 氪获悉，豆包的日均活跃用户数（DAU）已突破 1 亿大关，字节跳动 APP 王国里亿级 DAU 产品再添一子。

ByteDance insiders revealed that Doubao's user growth (UG) and marketing promotion costs are the lowest among all products with over 100 million DAU in ByteDance's history. 字节内部人士透露，豆包的 UG、市场推广费用，是字节历史上，所有破亿 DAU 产品中花费最低的。

Insiders said that Doubao's product retention is still good this year. In addition, Doubao's Seedream image generation model and Seedance video generation model continue to activate creative scenarios. Doubao's photo editing features, such as the three-panel grid, have repeatedly topped trending searches, driving millions of organic downloads daily. 有知情人士表示，今年豆包的产品留存还可以。此外，豆包 Seedream 生图模型、Seedance 生视频模型，持续激活创作场景。三宫格等豆包 P 图玩法连续登上热搜，每天带动的自然下载量高达百万级。

In contrast, ByteDance is one of the earliest companies in China to lay out in the AI field. As early as June 2023, ByteDance launched the Doubao APP. In comparison, Kimi was launched on October 9, 2023, and Tencent Yuanbao went online on May 30, 2024. Since then, Doubao has consistently topped the APP download charts. 对比之下，字节是国内较早布局 AI 领域的公司，早在 2023 年 6 月，字节就上线了豆包 APP，相比之下，kimi 于 2023 年 10 月 9 日推出，腾讯元宝 2024 年 5 月 30 日上线。此后，豆包长期霸榜 APP 下载榜榜首。

It is worth mentioning that Volcano Engine will also become the exclusive AI cloud partner for the 2026 CCTV Spring Festival Gala, and Doubao will also launch some interactive features in conjunction. 值得一提的是，火山引擎还将成为 2026 年中央广播电视总台春节联欢晚会独家 AI 云合作伙伴，豆包也将配合上线一些互动玩法。

However, there are also voices within ByteDance that believe Doubao's commercialization path is not yet clear, and the inference costs for a large DAU also put some pressure on the company's profits. But the report also points out that the commercialization progress of Doubao's large model MaaS service has significantly exceeded expectations, achieving ultra-high cost-effectiveness through technical optimization while also maintaining good gross margins. 但字节内部也有声音认为，豆包的商业化还看不到明确路径，大 DAU 的推理成本，也对公司利润有一定压力。但报道也指出，豆包大模型 MaaS 服务商业化进展大幅超出预期，通过技术优化实现超高性价比的同时也有不错的毛利。

item.title: 俞敏洪敲定东方甄选接班人
item.guid: 俞敏洪敲定东方甄选接班人
item.description:
According to Blue Whale News, Dongfang Zhenxuan has welcomed a new helmsman. Sun Jin, Vice President of New Oriental Education & Technology Group and Principal of Guangzhou School, will serve as the Executive President, and an announcement is expected to be released soon. 据蓝鲸新闻报道，东方甄选迎来新任掌舵人，新东方教育科技集团副总裁、广州学校校长孙进将担任执行总裁，预计近期将发布公告。

In response to the above situation, Dongfang Zhenxuan officially responded that the situation is true. 对于上述情况，东方甄选官方回应称，情况属实。

Public information shows that Sun Jin is the Vice President of New Oriental Education & Technology Group and Principal of Guangzhou School. He joined New Oriental in 2006, specializing in overseas exam training and school management, with rich experience in teaching and operations. 公开信息，孙进是新东方教育科技集团副总裁、广州学校校长，2006 年加入新东方，深耕出国考试培训与学校管理，教学与运营经验丰富。

According to IT Home, at the end of 2023, Sun Dongxu, then CEO of Dongfang Zhenxuan, was widely questioned by netizens for his improper handling of a dispute with top streamer Dong Yuhui regarding the ownership of copywriting. His management capabilities were criticized, and he was ultimately removed from his positions as Executive Director and CEO of Dongfang Zhenxuan in December 2023. 据 IT 之家报道，2023 年底，时任东方甄选 CEO 的孙东旭因处理与头部主播董宇辉之间关于文案创作归属的争议方式不当，引发网友广泛质疑，其管理能力受到批评，最终于 2023 年 12 月被免去东方甄选执行董事和 CEO 的职务。

On November 6, 2025, Yu Minhong, CEO of Dongfang Zhenxuan and Chairman of New Oriental Group, posted an article confirming that Sun Dongxu had officially left Dongfang Zhenxuan for personal reasons and would no longer be involved in company work. 2025 年 11 月 6 日，东方甄选 CEO、新东方集团董事长俞敏洪发文确认，孙东旭因个人原因正式离开东方甄选，不再参与公司工作。

item.title: 理想汽车第二产品线总裁被曝离职
item.guid: 理想汽车第二产品线总裁被曝离职
item.description:
According to LatePost Auto, Zhang Xiao, President of Li Auto's second product line, will resign soon. Zhang Xiao is an early employee of Li Auto, joining in May 2016 as a complete vehicle product manager. 据晚点 Auto 消息，理想汽车第二产品线总裁张骁将于近期离职。张骁是理想的早期员工，于 2016 年 5 月加入理想任整车产品经理。

The report points out that earlier, Zhang Xiao worked on vehicle product planning, development management, and other tasks at BMW MINI. 报道指出，更早之前，张骁在宝马 MINI 从事车型产品策划、开发管理等工作。

During his time at Li Auto, Zhang Xiao was deeply involved in the product definition of models such as Li ONE and L9, working closely with CEO Li Xiang; he also previously led the model portfolio planning for Li Auto's vehicles within Senior Vice President Fan Haoyu's team. 而在理想期间，张骁深度参与了理想 ONE、L9 等车型的产品定义，与 CEO 李想合作密切；他也曾在高级副总裁范皓宇团队内负责理想车型产品的型谱规划。

Currently, Li Auto divides its models into three product lines based on price range: 目前，按照售价区间，理想将旗下车型划分为三条产品线：

    The first product line covers models priced above 400,000 yuan, including MEGA and L9, and is led by Tang Jing;

    The second product line covers models priced from 300,000 to 400,000 yuan, including L8, L7, and i8, and is led by Zhang Xiao;

    The third product line covers models priced below 300,000 yuan, including L6 and i6, and is led by Li Xinyang.

Reports suggest that Zhang Xiao's departure may be related to the poor sales performance of the Li Auto i8. 报道称，张骁离职可能与理想 i8 销量表现不佳有关。

As the first model launched by Li Auto after entering the pure electric SUV segment, despite a one-year delay in its launch, the i8's market performance did not meet Li Auto's internal expectations. From mid-last year to the first half of this year, Zhang Xiao led the team to complete the styling adjustments and product design optimization for the Li Auto i8. 作为理想进入纯电 SUV 领域后推出的首款车型，尽管已延期一年上市，i8 的市场表现未达理想内部预期。从去年年中到今年上半年，张骁带队完成了理想 i8 的造型方案调整与产品设计优化。

According to reports, as of the end of November, the Li Auto i8 had accumulated 20,396 deliveries, which is 48.1% lower than the competing model Ledao L90 released during the same period. 据系，截至 11 月底，理想 i8 累计交付 20396 辆，较同期发布的竞品车型乐道 L90 低 48.1%。

item.title: 💡 微软 AI CEO：聊天机器人是宣泄情绪的有效方式
item.guid: 💡-微软-AI-CEO：聊天机器人是宣泄情绪的有效方式
item.description:
Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman recently stated that AI chatbots have become powerful tools for humans to vent emotions and achieve "self-detoxification." 微软 AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman 近日表示，AI 聊天机器人已成为人类宣泄情绪、实现「自我排毒」的强力工具。

In the recently launched podcast "Breakdown," Suleyman pointed out that companionship and emotional support have evolved into one of the most popular application scenarios for artificial intelligence. He observed that users are leveraging AI to address various emotional challenges, from coping with the pain of a breakup to resolving family conflicts. 在近期上线的播客节目《崩溃（Breakdown）》中，Suleyman 指出，陪伴与情感支持已演变为人工智能最受欢迎的应用场景之一。他观察到，用户正利用 AI 处理从应对分手痛苦到化解家庭矛盾等各类情感难题。

"This is not psychotherapy in the strict sense," Suleyman emphasized, "but these models were designed from the outset with principles of non-judgment and non-direction, adopting non-violent communication as their core interaction method. They are impartial, good listeners, and empathetic, ultimately becoming a much-needed tool for the world." 「这并非严格意义上的心理治疗，」苏莱曼强调，「但这类模型在设计之初便秉持不评判、无导向的原则，将非暴力沟通作为核心交互方式。它们立场公允、善于倾听且富有同理心，最终成为了一种被世界急需的工具。」

Suleyman believes that the value of this interaction lies in its ability to convey kindness and care, helping people to purify their minds and bodies (detoxify ourselves), so that they can return to reality in their best state and interact with their loved ones. 苏莱曼认为，这种交互的价值在于它能传递善意与关爱，帮助人们净化身心（detoxify ourselves），从而以最佳状态回归现实，与所爱之人相处。

However, professionals in the mental health field have also expressed concerns about this. 但心理健康领域的专业人士也对此表示担忧。

In March of this year, several psychological counselors warned in an interview with Business Insider that excessive reliance on AI for emotional support could exacerbate feelings of loneliness and foster a dependent mindset in people seeking comfort. 今年 3 月，多位心理咨询师在接受 Business Insider 采访时警告，过度依赖 AI 获取情感支持可能会加剧孤独感，并助长人们寻求安慰的依赖心理。

Suleyman also acknowledged this, admitting that chatbots indeed carry the risk of "inducing dependency" and can sometimes appear overly ingratiating or even "fawning." Suleyman 对此也予以承认，坦言聊天机器人确实存在「引发依赖」的风险，且有时会表现得过分讨好甚至「谄媚」。

item.title: 华为×广汽，启境官宣旗下猎装轿跑
item.guid: 华为×广汽，启境官宣旗下猎装轿跑
item.description:
Yesterday, the "Qijing" brand, jointly created by Huawei Qiankun and GAC Group, officially unveiled its first shooting brake coupe, touted as having "million-level aesthetics, million-level handling, and million-level intelligence." 昨日，华为乾崑与广汽集团联合打造的「启境」品牌正式公布了旗下首款猎装轿跑，号称「百万颜值、百万驾控、百万智能」。

According to the officially released content, the new car has a relatively low height and rounded overall lines; it is equipped with a roof-mounted lidar and frameless doors, and the vehicle is expected to feature "L3-level" autonomous driving. Additionally, the front seats adopt an integrated design. 从官方公布的内容显示，新车高度较为低矮，整体线条圆润；配备车顶激光雷达以及无边框车门，并且车辆有望采用「L3 级」驾驶。另外，前排座椅采用一体式设计。

It is reported that this model is expected to be officially launched and begin deliveries in June 2026. The joint team of Qijing and Huawei Qiankun is currently conducting in-depth joint debugging in the final stage of product development. 据悉，该款车型预计 2026 年 6 月正式上市并开启交付。启境和华为乾崑的联合团队正在进行产品开发最后阶段的深度联调。

item.title: 鸿蒙智行首款 MPV 或首发「头套气囊」
item.guid: 鸿蒙智行首款-MPV-或首发「头套气囊」
item.description:
Recently, more configuration details of the HarmonyOS Smart Travel's first MPV model, "Zhijie V9," have been exposed. 近期，鸿蒙智行首款 MPV 车型「智界 V9」更多配置信息遭到曝光。

🔗 Related Reading: Zhijie V9 details exposed! Industry's first "hood airbag," even Zunjie S800 will be envious 🔗 相关阅读： 智界 V9 细节曝光！行业首发「头套气囊」，连尊界 S800 都要眼红

The new car continues the Zhijie brand's new energy design language, with a length of 5.3 meters and a wheelbase of nearly 3.2 meters. In terms of specific configurations, it will offer a full-featured Turing platform, chassis tuning with CDC and air suspension, Huawei's self-developed three-electric system, smart headlights with projection, and a 192-line lidar. 新车在设计上延续了智界品牌的新能源语言，5.3 米级的车长与近 3.2 米的轴距。具体配置上，将提供满血版的途灵平台、配合 CDC 与空气悬架的底盘调校、华为自研的三电系统，带投影的智能大灯以及 192 线的激光雷达。

Notably, the Zhijie V9, for its zero-gravity seat safety system, has introduced an industry-first "hood-type airbag" (HAB). 值得关注的是，智界 V9 为零重力座安全系统，掏出了一套行业首发的「头套式安全气囊」（HAB）。

This special airbag is integrated into the top of the seatback. Upon deployment, it forms a unique "U-shaped" enveloping structure, like a large hood, rapidly wrapping around the passenger's head, neck, and chest from above and the sides. 这个特殊的气囊被集成在座椅靠背顶部，触发瞬间会形成一个独特的「U 型」环绕结构，像一顶巨大的兜帽，从上方和两侧迅速包裹住乘客的头、颈和胸部。

It can not only cope with frontal collisions, but in rollover accidents, which are a major concern for MPVs, this enveloping structure can firmly lock the passenger's torso, preventing the head from hitting the B-pillar. Moreover, this 'hood' is just the last line of defense. Before it activates, the ZHIJIE V9 has a series of linked actions to counteract physical inertia. 它不仅能应对正面碰撞，在 MPV 比较担心的翻滚事故中，这个环抱结构都能死死锁住乘客的躯干，防止头部撞向 B 柱。而且，这个「兜帽」只是最后一道防线。在它启动之前，智界 V9 还有一连串联动动作来对抗物理惯性。

To solve the problem of 'submarining,' the ZHIJIE V9 also features a dedicated buttock airbag (BAB) at the front of the seat cushion, which rapidly inflates upon impact to form a physical slope, holding the pelvis in place to prevent the body from slipping out, thereby significantly reducing lumbar pressure. 为了解决「潜滑」这个问题，智界 V9 还在坐垫前端布置了专门的臀部气囊（BAB），在碰撞瞬间快速充气形成物理坡度，顶住盆骨不让身体滑脱，从而大幅降低腰椎压力。

It is reported that this solution comes from the supplier Yanfeng Automotive Interiors Systems Co., Ltd. According to information disclosed by Yanfeng, the Huanyi system began development as early as 2020, undergoing more than three years of refinement and completing over 700 physical collision tests. 据悉，这套方案来自于供应商延锋汽车饰件系统有限公司。根据延锋披露的信息，寰翼系统早在 2020 年就开始了研发，期间历经三年多的打磨，完成了 700 多次物理碰撞试验。

item.title: 索尼第六代「降噪豆」有望回归硅胶耳塞
item.guid: 索尼第六代「降噪豆」有望回归硅胶耳塞
item.description:
Sony WF-1000XM5

According to a recent report by The Walkman Blog, accessory information for Sony's next-generation flagship noise-canceling headphones, the WF-1000XM6 (or the sixth-generation 'noise-canceling beans'), was found on the website of parts distributor Encompass Parts. 据 The Walkman Blog 近期报道，其在零件分销商 Encompass Parts 网站中，发现了索尼下一代旗舰降噪耳机 WF-1000XM6（或为第六代降噪豆）的相关配件信息。

The report states that the core accessory leaked this time is the eartip kit (TPKIT). Notably, this accessory is clearly labeled as 'Silicone Tips,' not the 'Foam Isolation Tips' used by the fifth-generation 'noise-canceling beans' (WF-1000XM5). 报道称，本次泄露的核心配件为耳机套（TPKIT）。值得关注的是，该配件被明确标注为「硅胶耳塞套」（Silicone Tips），并非第五代降噪豆（WF-1000XM5）所采用的「聚氨酯泡沫隔音耳塞」（Foam Isolation Tips）。

Additionally, according to the website information, the shipping date for accessories related to these headphones is marked as February 27, 2026. 另外，据网站信息显示，该耳机相关配件的发货日期被标记为 2026 年 2 月 27 日。

The report points out that, according to supply chain practices, accessory distribution usually coincides with or slightly precedes product launch, strongly suggesting that Sony is highly likely to officially release this flagship headphone in the first quarter of 2026. 报道指出，依据供应链惯例，配件铺货通常与产品上市同步或略早，这强烈暗示索尼极有可能在 2026 年第一季度正式发布这款旗舰耳机。

At the same time, the leaked information further confirms the WF-1000XM6's initial color lineup—black and silver options appeared in the list. 同时，泄露信息进一步确认了 WF-1000XM6 的首发配色阵容——清单中出现了黑色（Black）和银色（Silver）两种选项。

item.title: QQ 音乐上线 20.0 版本
item.guid: QQ-音乐上线-20.0-版本
item.description:
Recently, QQ Music officially launched version 20.0 and updated multiple features: 近期，QQ 音乐正式推出 20.0 版本，并更新多项功能：

    Introduced NAC audio quality: Using neural networks as its core and relying on a massive song dataset, it has achieved a significant improvement in compression performance. Compared to the advanced open-source codec OGG, NAC's compression rate has increased by 20%, achieving a balance between 'sound quality and data usage'.

    AI Agent Smart Music Butler: Users can express their needs using natural language, and the AI Agent can accurately understand and execute them, improving the convenience of using the client.

    'Premium Panoramic Sound 3.0' feature: Utilizes an AI trajectory prediction model to analyze music styles, capable of calculating and rendering the dynamic movement paths of sound elements in three-dimensional space, achieving an immersive experience from static stereo to dynamic panoramic sound. Combined with a high-dimensional panoramic rendering engine that supports up to 9.1.6 channel output, it can expand the soundstage width and depth, and restore the spatial orientation of sound objects.

    The new client also adds features such as '3D Player,' 'Listen to Music and Raise Fish,' and 'Starlight Tab'.

item.title: 梦回小时候，Google 推出「可以玩」的 Android 小手办
item.guid: 梦回小时候，Google-推出「可以玩」的-Android-小手办
item.description:
Recently, the official Google Store listed a unique Android robot figurine. 近期，Google 官方商城上架了一个独特的 Android 机器人小手办。

According to the description, this Android robot figurine is composed of transparent plastic and an internal green maze section. The small maze inside has a small steel ball that can move, and its gameplay is similar to the marble maze toys from childhood. 据介绍，这个 Android 机器人小手办由透明塑料及内部的绿色迷宫部分组成，体内的小迷宫拥有一枚小钢珠能够活动，其玩法与小时候的滚珠迷宫玩具差不多。

item.title: 造谣「B 站全面付费观看」相关人员被行拘
item.guid: 造谣「B-站全面付费观看」相关人员被行拘
item.description:
According to Yicai, the police quickly arrested and administratively detained the rumor-mongers for spreading false information that "all Bilibili (B站) videos will require a membership to watch next year." 据第一财经报道，因发布「明年 B 站（哔哩哔哩）所有视频需购买会员才能观看」不实信息，警方迅速将相关造谣人员抓获并依法予以行政拘留。

Bilibili stated through the report that it reserves the right to further prosecute the perpetrator of this illegal act. B 站方面通过报道表示，将保留对该违法行为人进一步追诉的权利。

According to IT Home, a screenshot of a message from Bilibili to its users has recently been circulating on the internet. The screenshot shows: 另据 IT 之家报道，近期有一条关于 B 站致用户的截图在互联网流传。该截图显示：

To continuously strengthen the foundation of the community ecosystem, ensure the sustainability of high-quality content creation, and provide users with a more stable, high-definition, and diverse audio-visual experience, starting from March 1, 2026, all video resources on the platform (including anime, Chinese animation, films, documentaries, UP creator original videos, and all other categories) will require the purchase of a "Bilibili Video Membership" for complete viewing. Basic bullet comment functionality will also be tied to membership benefits.

At the time, Bilibili customer service responded, "This message is false. We will pursue legal action against those who spread rumors. We also ask everyone not to easily believe or spread online rumors." 当时，B 站客服回应称，「该消息为不实消息，对于造谣者我们将追究法律责任。也请大家切勿轻信和传播网络谣言。」

item.title: 刘德华献唱，华为非凡大师主题曲《非凡》下周上线

It is reported that "Extraordinary" will be sung by Andy Lau, with lyrics by Tang Tian, music by Cai Xiao'en, and production by Zheng Nan. At the same time, Huawei officially released the theme song preview for "Extraordinary." 据悉，《非凡》将由刘德华演唱，歌曲作词由唐恬负责、作曲由蔡晓恩负责、制作由郑楠负责。同时，华为官方还发布了《非凡》的主题曲预告。

According to Sina Film, the spy action film "Artificial Intelligence" (《人工情报》) is scheduled to be released in South Korea on February 11. 据新浪电影消息，谍战动作电影《人工情报》定档 2 月 11 日韩国上映。

item.title: 《情圣 3》释出终极预告
item.guid: 《情圣-3》释出终极预告
item.description:
Recently, the movie "The Love Expert 3" (《情圣 3》) released its final trailer and will be released on December 27. 日前，电影《情圣 3》释出终极预告，将于 12 月 27 日上映。

The film tells the story of Tian Shaoji and Shao Meizhen, a couple facing a marital crisis. One asks an AI with a worried expression and seeks help from strategist Gan Huowang, while the other constantly plays tricks, leading the husband to transform into a "love detective" frantically checking up on her. 影片讲述田绍基与邵美珍夫妻二人陷入婚姻危机，一个对着人工智能一脸愁容发问，外加寻求军师甘火旺的帮助，一个花招不断，引发丈夫化身「爱情侦探」疯狂查岗。

The film is produced by Xiao Yang, directed by Dong Xu, and stars Xiao Yang, Tan Zhuo, and Qiao Shan. Chang Yuan, Zhang Xiaowan, Dai Lele, Allen, Fan Tiantian, Xiao Shenyang, Wang Xun, and Manow Sophisa (Manao) also appear in the film. 影片由肖央担任监制，董旭执导，肖央、谭卓、乔杉领衔主演，常远、张小婉、代乐乐、艾伦、范湉湉、小沈阳、王迅、Manow Sophisa（玛瑙）出演。

早报
